title: Validate SMTP uses Primary nexthop [Index 0 DestinationIP] as first attempt, 2nd attempt with secondary nexthop in case of DNS/TCP connection failure to 1st attempt
custom_steps:
- Setup primary nexthop as host=invalid-nexthop.co to simulate DNS failure error 
- Ensure service, attempt first to primary and only use secondary upon failure
- Setup secondary nexthop as valid host and port
- Validate service tries to perform DNS check on first host once and then try to second host to perform DNS and TCP connection. 
- Validate email go through correctly and no failure
- Review smtpreq 3 smtp 3 logs
custom_expected: - Ensure primary next hop is tried first before back connection made to Secondary
